plot: Years after a civil war, Erasmo's must face violence once more: His foster mother was murdered. On his way to find the murderer he makes friends with the Jew Saul.
title: Un crisantemo estalla en cinco esquinas
plot_es: Years after a civil war, Erasmo's must face violence once more: His foster mother was murdered. On his way to find the murderer he makes friends with the Jew Saul.
original_name: Un crisantemo estalla en cinco esquinas
